New Records: Klay Thompson set a franchise record for most 3s on debut for the Mavericks
Key Match Events: Thompson drained a 3 from beyond the arc in the fourth quarter
Pre-Game Insights: Klay Thompson struggled in the preseason, averaging just 7.0 points per game on 33% shooting from the 3-point line
Post-Match Reflections: Thompson smiled and pumped his fists in happiness after the game
The Mavs will hope Thompson can build on this performance throughout the season
Miscellaneous Highlights: Klay Thompson and the Mavericks hit the road to play Kevin Durant and the Phoenix Suns at Footprint Center on Saturday
Thompson was one of the blockbuster trades this offseason as he inked a three-year, $50 million deal with the Mavericks
Others: The Mavericks trailed the Spurs 49-47 at halftime
Thompson had eight points, six rebounds and two steals at halftime
